questions.question: making sure the beach does not have ____ on it
taking action to attract ____ to the place
walk across the sands and reach the ____

sections.instructions: Questions 11–14: Choose the correct letter A, B or C. Questions 15–20: Choose TWO letters A–E.
sections.title: Boat trip round Tasmania

questions.question: What is the maximum number of people who can stand on each side of the boat?
What colour are the tour boats?
Which lunchbox is suitable for someone who doesn't eat meat or fish?
What should people do with their litter?
options: B hand it to a member of staff
C put it in the bins provided on the boat

questions.question: Which TWO features of the lighthouse does Lou mention?
Which TWO types of creature might come close to the boat?
Which TWO points does Lou make about the caves?

sections.instructions: Questions 21–26: Choose the correct letter A, B or C. Questions 27–30: Choose FOUR letters A–F.
sections.title: Work experience for veterinary science students

questions.question: What problem did both Diana and Tim have when arranging their work experience?
options: A making initial contact with suitable farms
B organising transport to and from the farm
C finding a placement for the required length of time

questions.question: Tim was pleased to be able to help
options: A a lamb that had a broken leg
B a sheep that was having difficulty giving birth
C a newly born lamb that was having trouble feeding

questions.question: Diana says the sheep on her farm
options: A were of various different varieties
B were mainly reared for their meat
C had better quality wool than sheep on the hills

questions.question: What did the students learn about adding supplements to chicken feed?
options: A These should only be given if specially needed
B It is worth paying extra for the most effective ones
C The amount given at one time should be limited

questions.question: What happened when Diana was working with dairy cows?
options: A She identified some cows incorrectly
B She accidentally threw some milk away
C She made a mistake when storing milk

questions.question: What did both farmers mention about vets and farming?
options: A Vets are failing to cope with some aspects of animal health
B There needs to be a fundamental change in the training of vets
C Some jobs could be done by the farmer rather than by a vet

sections.instructions: Write ONE WORD ONLY for each answer.
sections.title: Labyrinths

questions.question: ____ is needed to navigate through a maze
once had a big ____ at its centre
